name: Idle Ghost Hotel
description:
Welcome to the resting place for cute ghosts!
Develop your Ghost Hotel with simple taps!
You can progress quickly in this game.

Welcome a variety of ghost guests to earn a bigger profit!
Each guest wants something different!
Listen to their requests and find ways to keep them satisfied.
Guests that enjoyed their stay will leave a tip.

You can also hire a manager to help out!
Become the proprietor of the Ghost Hotel and help your guests have a good time!

Hotel
You can expand the hotel upwards. The higher the floor, the higher the cost and the quality of the interior!
Open up all the floors to allow numerous guests to have a relaxing time!

Restaurant
Merge similar types of desserts to discover new kinds of desserts.
Create delicious cookings to make your guests happy!

Crafting
You can have a variety of equipment in the rooms.
There are useful functions for managing the hotel as well! Give them a try.

Collection
You can view various detailed information on your guests.
The manager is also listed in it as well.

Zombie Island
They're good friends who helped build the hotel, but... Shall we try asking them nicely to leave?
You can earn more gems the higher your score~!


The ghost guests will relax in their rooms and make use of all the different facilities!
A spa, gym, dance hall, cafe, rooftop, and more. Each place has different things to do, so give them a try!

Now then, are you ready to greet the ghost guests?
Check in to the Ghost Hotel now!
